judoka_1.desc_unlocked: The Judoka has the power to control computers with the mind, and guides new wizards through the worlds of Kano.
judoka_1.title: Judoka 1

judoka_2.desc_unlocked: Judoka can travel around the world through the Internet, and loves sea-urchin sushi and throwing code blocks at bad guys – the evil Robotniks, who eat up beautiful computers and turn them into boring grey boxes.
judoka_2.title: Judoka 2

judoka_3.desc_unlocked: Judoka has the power to go from real, to digital all the way to terminal based – in the blink of an eye! Sometimes the effect runs off over time, so 0's and 1's can hang around like a digital aura.
judoka_3.title: Judoka 3
